item.title: Creating a Game Engine
item.description: Followed Carl Birch’s tutorial with the addition of the meta build system CMake in an attempt to create a “game engine”. [WIP]-Will be implementing a GUI with dear imgui frontend alongside a raw implementation of openGL. The Repo can be found here.

item.title: Android Development with ChatGPT
item.description: Reliability was an issue but it was refreshing to get responses based on conceptual questions. A refreshing alternative to using a traditional search engine. A beginner’s question answered with sufficient and straightforward instructions.

item.title: About
item.description: Education Public schools in the Saddleback Valley Unified School District and Saddleback College make up my educational experience. Interests Furthering my knowledge in Game Engine development Exploring DAWs for music development The development of apps through Android Studio Researching new softwares and technologies Skills The languages I know best include C++ and C, Java, Python, and RISC-V. Server stacks such as LAMP, MEAN , and NMP, as well as database languages SQL/mariaDB and MangoDB.

item.title: hello world!!!
item.description: hello world in languages I know #include<iostream> int main(){ std::cout << "hello person!" << std::endl; return 0; } printf("hello again!") public static void main(String[]args){ System.out.println("Hello once more!\n"); } MOV X1, #1 LDR X1, =helloworld MOV X2, #13 MOV X8, #64 SVC 0
